sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>true</before> <description>This fix script deletes the old branding indexes prior quebec.</description> <name>Delete Old branding indexes</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var util = new GlideIndexUtils(); var table = "sys_cs_branding_setup"; util.dropByName(table, "branding_name"); util.dropByName(table, "branding_key");]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-27 12:41:36</sys_created_on> <sys_id>631da881532310109686ddeeff7b1277</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete Old branding indexes</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Conversation Branding Settings" source="com.glide.cs.branding">217df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f76</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_631da881532310109686ddeeff7b1277</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-10-25 18:01:40</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
